import{useEffect}from"react";export var useClickOutside=function useClickOutside(ref,callback){useEffect(function(){var listener=function listener(event){// Do nothing if clicking ref's element or descendent elements
if(!ref.current||ref.current.contains(event.target)){return;}callback();};document.addEventListener("click",listener);return function(){document.removeEventListener("click",listener);};},[ref,callback]);};
